The status of the Activity Instance from Created | Available | In Execution (Running) | Suspended | Completed | Aborted

examples.content:

        "activityInstanceId": "5c5b901a324b051370ac2f3e",

        "endTime": null,
        "userSubmissionTime": null,
        "actualSubmissionTime": null,
        "instanceOf": {
            "name": "SWAP",
        },
        "state": "completed",
        "patientPin": 4015,
        "situation": "Explain the principal",
        "worry": "Fear to speak",
        "action": "Practice WorryHeads"
}
